description: Implement schema-first design for plan.json to ensure consistent structure between create_plan and all downstream consumers (generate_deliverables, execute_plan, etc.)
goal: Make the planning workflow robust by enforcing a JSON schema contract - eliminating schema mismatch errors like 'string indices must be integers'
requirements: Create plan.schema.json as single source of truth
Update create_plan to return schema with instructions
Update validate_plan to validate against schema before scoring
Update generate_deliverables_template to handle the defined schema
Add schema_version field to all generated plans
Provide clear error messages on schema violations
out_of_scope: Modifying other MCP tools not related to planning
constraints: Must be backward compatible with existing plans where possible
Schema must be human-readable and AI-friendly
No breaking changes to MCP tool signatures
